title: MicroStrategy Holds 1% of Total Bitcoin Supply After $600 Million Purchase
description: The analytics firm put $500 million in convertible notes on the market to fund its latest BTC purchase.

title: Why is Bitcoin price down today?
description:
Bitcoin price is down today as an uptick in liquidations and recent GBTC outflows negatively impact investor sentiment.

The price of Bitcoin (BTC) dropped 7.2% to as low as $62,400 on March 19 as a broader market correction reinforced BTC’s resistance at the $68,000 level. BTC is now trading 15% below its $73,835 all-time high reached on March 14.

Let’s investigate the reasons behind Bitcoin’s price decline.

Bitcoin price fell under $63,000 on March 19, causing a marketwide sell-off that saw the global crypto market capitalization drop 8% over the past 24 hours to rest at $2.4 trillion, according to data from CoinMarketCap.

Read more

title: Velar Launches Dharma AMM to Propel Bitcoin Into the Decentralized Finance Spotlight

title: Nigerian court orders Binance to provide trading data amidst financial crime probe
description: In a significant development in Nigeria’s crackdown on financial crimes involving cryptocurrency, a court has issued an interim order mandating Binance, a leading global cryptocurrency exchange, to furnish comprehensive information about Nigerian traders on its platform. The directive follows a motion filed by Nigeria’s Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC), seeking data on individuals trading […]
